content: free version available as written pattern on my blog https //www sweetsofties com/2023/06/galaxy-jellyfish html pdf pattern includes photo references the galaxy jellyfish is a no-sew amigurumi pattern that works up quickly and easily it has two types of tentacles curly and straight/thin this pattern can easily be customized with different yarn color e g ombre variegated self-striping yarn fibers or yarn weights this underwater sea creature toy is great for craft fairs and markets it s a unisex and gender neutral stuffed animal that will appeal to boys girls children adults and everyone in between it s a great last-minute birthday and holiday gift the pdf pattern includes full written instructions and photo references to guide you through the doll making process **size** height 8 inches 20 cm **materials** medium worsted weight #4 yarn - dgy sparkle worsted weight https //glnk io/47/jade approx 50 yards 14mm plastic safety eyes x2 - i used these sparkly eyes https //temu to/k/usnwak3slsxpluo 3 25mm crochet hook for the body 4mm crochet hook for the tentacles stuffing scissors note on materials this versatile pattern can be worked with different yarn weights remember to use a hook size appropriate to the yarn weight to crochet tight stitches without gaps **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet *copyright notice this pattern is © 2023 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not translate distribute copy alter or sell this pattern in any way my patterns may not be used in video tutorials or for teaching classes both online and in-person you may link to this pattern but you may not copy any part of the pattern instructions on other websites you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my website no wholesale * ----- social media & contact ----- website/blog https //www sweetsofties com/ youtube channel https //www youtube com/sweetsofties facebook https //www facebook com/sweetsofties instagram https //www instagram com/sweetsofties/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@sweetsofties com twitter http //twitter com/sweetsofties etsy https //www etsy com/shop/sweetsoftiesco ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/sweet-softies pinterest https //www pinterest com/sweetsofties
